## AbstractDevice.createTexture2DFromImage() method

Creates a 2d texture from a image element

**Signature:**

```typescript
createTexture2DFromImage(element: TextureImageElement, sRGB: boolean, options?: TextureCreationOptions): Texture2D;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | [TextureImageElement](doc/markdown/./device.textureimageelement.md) | The image element |
|  sRGB | boolean |  |
|  options | [TextureCreationOptions](doc/markdown/./device.texturecreationoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ The creation options |
